resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: An API for fetching real-time stock data including company details, pricing, market trends, and financials.
resource_dependency.authAPI: Authentication endpoints for login, signup, session management, and user validation.
resource_dependency.reportGenerationAPI: An internal API endpoint to generate customized stock reports based on user selections.
resource_dependency.exportServiceAPI: External or internal service capable of exporting documents in PDF, Excel, and HTML formats.
resource_dependency.databaseSchema: PostgreSQL schema with tables: users (id, email, password_hash), stocks (symbol, name, sector, etc.), reports (id, user_id, stock_symbol, format, content_selections, created_at, file_path), and report_history (user_id, report_id).

function: Fetch all stock data dynamically from backend APIs for display and processing.
static_description: The main dashboard displays a clean white background with navy-colored UI components. It includes a header bar with navigation links, a search bar for entering stock codes or names, and a loading spinner when data is being fetched.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search button triggers an API call to fetch stock data using the entered symbol or name.
Pressing Enter after typing in the search field initiates the same stock data fetch action.

function: Provide backend API services that connect to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables.
static_description: Backend server initialized with secure connection to PostgreSQL database using provided credentials. Exposes RESTful API endpoints under /api namespace.

resource_dependency.inputFieldPlaceholderText: Enter stock code or company name

function: Allow users to input stock codes or names to initiate searches.
static_description: A centered search container featuring a navy-themed input textbox with placeholder text 'Enter stock code or company name' and a magnifying glass icon aligned to the right side.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search icon or pressing enter submits the query to the backend API to retrieve matching stock results.

function: Enable users to customize their stock report by selecting preferred formats and content sections.
static_description: Below the search results appears a customization panel with checkboxes for selecting report sections ('Basic Info', 'Market Trends', 'Financial Data') and radio buttons for choosing output format ('PDF', 'Excel', 'HTML'). All controls use navy styling against a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting any checkbox toggles inclusion of that section in the generated report; clicking a format option sets the desired export type.

resource_dependency.reportTemplateEngine: A templating engine (like Handlebars or Jinja) used to render dynamic content into selected formats.

function: Generate customized stock reports automatically upon user request based on selected options.
static_description: Upon submission, a progress indicator shows while the system generates the requested report behind the scenes.

interaction_and_states.description: After configuring preferences, submitting triggers automated generation via the reportGenerationAPI which returns either success status with download link or error message.

function: Display essential stock information such as company details and current pricing metrics.
static_description: Following successful search, this area presents structured company info including logo image, company name, industry sector, live price value, and percentage change â€“ styled consistently with navy headers over white cards.

resource_dependency.chartLibrary: Integration with chart.js or similar library for rendering interactive line/bar graphs showing historical performance.

function: Visualize market trend analysis through charts or graphs derived from historical data.
static_description: This section renders responsive graphical representations of stock movements across different time intervals using line or candlestick charts rendered in dark navy tones.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can toggle between various timeline views (e.g., 1 month, YTD) which reloads updated chart data accordingly.

function: Showcase critical financial indicators including earnings, revenue figures, and key ratios.
static_description: Displays tabulated financial statistics in clearly labeled rows beneath other informational sections, maintaining consistent typography and spacing within navy-accented boxes.

function: Apply a uniform aesthetic theme throughout the application with a white background and navy-colored interface elements.
static_description: All pages feature a solid white canvas backdrop complemented by rich navy hues applied to buttons, headers, footers, and form controls ensuring visual consistency.

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience across desktop and mobile platforms through adaptive layouts.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly depending on screen size, stacking vertical elements on smaller screens while expanding horizontally on larger ones without compromising usability or readability.

resource_dependency.sessionTimeoutHandler: Redirects unauthenticated users attempting to access protected routes back to login page.

function: Implement authentication mechanism to control access and maintain individual user sessions.
static_description: At the top-right corner lies a profile menu accessible only after logging in, displaying username initials or avatar alongside logout option.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' navigates to dedicated sign-in view where credentials are submitted securely via POST request handled by authAPI.

resource_dependency.savedReportsTableSchema: Database table storing previous report metadata including timestamps, associated stock symbols, and downloadable paths.

function: Permit saving and retrieving past generated reports tied to authenticated user accounts.
static_description: Accessible via navigation menu, this section lists previously created reports chronologically with titles indicating relevant stocks and creation dates shown in compact card-style entries.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting any listed entry retrieves full stored document either inline or prompts direct download depending on original format.

function: Support exporting generated reports into multiple file types suitable for offline consumption or sharing.
static_description: Each completed report view features prominently placed 'Download Report' button offering dropdown choices among supported formats before initiating file transfer.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing an export method triggers respective handler which processes existing report content accordingly then serves resulting file directly to browser.

resource_dependency.externalFinanceDataProvider: Third-party finance API providing up-to-the-minute stock quotes, news feeds, analyst ratings, and macroeconomic indicators.

function: Continuously pull fresh data from authoritative external financial sources to ensure accuracy and timeliness.
static_description: Underlying systems poll trusted market data providers periodically or reactively upon significant events ensuring displayed values remain current even during active usage.

resource_dependency.errorMessagesDictionary: {INVALID_STOCK_CODE: 'Please enter a valid stock ticker.', DB_CONNECTION_FAILED: 'Unable to reach database. Try again later.', API_FAILURE: 'Data retrieval failed due to upstream issue.'}

function: Gracefully handle exceptional conditions such as incorrect inputs, connectivity problems, or broken dependencies.
static_description: In case of failure, informative alerts appear near affected areas explaining nature of problem along with guidance steps or retry suggestions using subtle red coloring contrasting navy base palette.

interaction_and_states.description: Some errors present optional retry button allowing immediate reattempt once transient issues resolve themselves.
